code:
---
id: auth-metrics-flow
title: "SmartEdify – Auth Metrics Flow"
description: "Instrumentation path for login, refresh, and password recovery metrics across the auth lifecycle."
updated: 2025-02-14
tags: [Groupware_WikiPage]
---
flowchart TD
    subgraph Request[Groupware_ChatRoom]
        L[Groupware_ChatRoom]
        V[Groupware_KanbanBoard]
        H[Groupware_KanbanBoard]
        T[Groupware_ChatRoom]
        R[Groupware_ChatRoom]
    end

    L --> V --> H -->|ok| T --> R
    H -->|fail| F[Groupware_KanbanBoard]

    subgraph Metrics[Groupware_WikiPage]
        MS[Groupware_SprintBacklog]
        MF[Groupware_SprintBacklog]
        MR[Groupware_IssueTracker]
        MP[Groupware_SprintBacklog]
    end

    R --> MS
    F --> MF

    subgraph Refresh[Groupware_WikiPage]
        C[Groupware_KanbanBoard] -->|reuse| RU[Groupware_IssueTracker]
        C -->|clean| NI[Groupware_IssueTracker]
    end

    T --> C
    RU --> MR
    PS[Groupware_WikiPage] --> MP

    classDef metric fill:#eef,stroke:#336
    class MS,MF,MR,MP metric
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
